title: Rename Track Package to Track Order and move tracking section below Free Quote

requirements.text: Rename all user-facing UI text that currently says "Track Package" to instead say "Track Order", including navigation, hero CTA button, footer quick link, and the Track section headings/titles/descriptions.

quotes: Can you change track package to track order.

acceptanceCriteria: Site header navigation label reads "Track Order" on desktop and mobile.
Hero secondary CTA button reads "Track Order".
Track section headline reads "Track Your Order" (and related card title/description copy is updated to use "Order" instead of "Package" where appropriate).
No remaining visible instances of the exact phrase "Track Package" appear in the UI.

requirements.text: Reorder the homepage sections so that the Pricing section is immediately followed by the "Get Your Free Quote" / "Request a Quote" form section, and the Track Order section appears beneath the Free Quote section.

quotes: Also can you move it beneath the get your free quote. This is so that the request a quote form is right beneath the prices

acceptanceCriteria: On the rendered page, the section order is: Hero -> Pricing -> Get Your Free Quote (Request a Quote form) -> Track Order -> Footer.
Clicking the header/footer "Track Order" navigation item still smooth-scrolls to the Track Order section after it has been moved.
Clicking "Get a Quote" / "Get a Free Quote" still smooth-scrolls to the quote form section, which is now directly under Pricing.

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui must not be edited (compose them instead).
Do not edit immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not change backend tracking or contact-form behavior.
Do not change pricing tiers or quote form fields/validation logic.
